title: Jack Ma | Biography, Alibaba, & Facts | Britannica Money

quotes: In September 2018 it was announced that Ma would step down as chair of Alibaba the following year, though he would remain on the board.
In September 2018 it was announced that Ma would step down as chair of Alibaba the following year, though he would remain on the board.
In 2014 Ma oversaw the creation of the Ant Group, which served as the parent group of Alipay and other financial services.
In 2020 Ant was scheduled for an IPO. However, that was delayed when Chinese officials demanded that the company be restructured.
In April 2021 Alibaba was charged with a $2.8 billion antitrust fine for violating anti-monopoly laws.
